title: Wipro sues former CFO Jatin Dalal who joined rival Cognizant
description: Former Wipro CFO Jatin Dalal joined Cognizant on December 1. While the reasons for the suit remain uncertain, the next hearing is scheduled on January 3, a person with direct knowledge ET spoke to confirmed.
content: In another lawsuit, IT major Wipro has filed a complaint against its former chief financial officer (CFO) Jatin Dalal, who joined global rival Cognizant on December 1.While the reasons for the suit remain uncertain, the next hearing is scheduled on January 3, a person with direct knowledge ET spoke to confirmed.Dalal announced his resignation in September after a stint of over 21 years at Wipro, India’s fourth-largest IT service provider. Dalal’s last day at Wipro was November 30.The complaint against Dalal has been filed in the civil court in Bengaluru where Wipro is headquartered, following which Dalal has filed an application, asking the court to refer the matter to arbitration, a development first reported by TOI.The court will hear the arguments for both the parties and decide whether the matter should be referred to arbitration.
